welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Iona, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southwest Florida International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta, American, and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naples Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
